Employee.name: Employee
Employee.description: Represents an employee within a company or organization.

AboutMe.description: Information about the employee, such as areas of interest or skills. Values can be provided on Employee’s profile page. This field is available even if Chatter is disabled.

AvailabilityEndDate.description: The end date of the Employee’s availability, inclusive of the date.

AvailabilityStartDate.description: The start date of the Employee’s availability, inclusive of the date.

BannerPhotoUrl.description: Read only. The URL for the employee's banner photo. Available in API v51.0 and later.

Email.description: The employee’s email address. This field is unique within your organization.

EmployeeNumber.description: Required. The employee's employment ID for the organization they were hired into. This field is unique within your organization.

EmployeeStatus.description: Required. The employee's current work status.

EmploymentType.description: The employee's full-time or part-time status.

FullPhotoUrl.description: Read only. The URL for the employee's profile photo. The URL is updated every time a photo is uploaded and reflects the most recent photo. If a newer photo has been uploaded, the URL returned for an older photo isn’t guaranteed to return a photo. Query this field for the URL of the most recent photo. Available in API v51.0 and later.

HomeCity.description: The city for the employee’s home address.

HomeCountry.description: The county for the employee’s home address.

HomeGeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of an employee’s home address geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

HomeLatitude.description: Used with HomeLongitude to specify the precise geolocation of the employee’s home address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

HomeLongitude.description: Used with HomeLatitude to specify the precise geolocation of the employee’s home address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

HomePostalCode.description: The postal code for the employee’s home address.

HomeState.description: The state for the employee’s home address.

HomeStreet.description: The street for the employee’s home address.

IndividualId.description: A reference to the Individual record that this employee is assigned to.

InternalOrganizationUnitId.description: A reference to the InternalOrganizationUnit this employee is assigned to.

JobProfile.description: The employee’s job profile at the company.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LocationId.description: A reference to the Location that this employee is assigned to.

ManagerId.description: A reference to the Employee record of the employee's manager.

MediumPhotoUrl.description: Read only. The URL for the medium-sized employee's profile photo. The URL is updated every time a photo is uploaded and reflects the most recent photo. If a newer photo has been uploaded, the URL returned for an older photo isn’t guaranteed to return a photo. Query this field for the URL of the most recent photo. Available in API v51.0 and later.

Name.description: A compound field of Employee.FirstName, Employee.MiddleName, and Employee.LastName.

OutOfOfficeMessage.description: The message portion of the employee availability. This message can provide reasons or details about the change in availability. The maximum length of this string is 40 characters.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who currently owns this record. Default value is the user logged in to the API to perform the create operation.

PreferredFirstName.description: The name the employee prefers to be called.

RelatedPersonId.description: Links an employee to a person account with a unique value. Reserved for future use. Don’t edit it.

SmallPhotoUrl.description: Read only. The URL for the small-sized employee's profile photo. The URL is updated every time a photo is uploaded and reflects the most recent photo. If a newer photo has been uploaded, the URL returned for an older photo isn’t guaranteed to return a photo. Query this field for the URL of the most recent photo. Available in API v51.0 and later.

StatusAsOf.description: Required. Start date of the employee’s current status.

StatusEndDate.description: Planned end date for the employee’s status.

TimeZone.description: The time zone which the employee’s work hours fall within.

UserId.description: Lookup field to associate an Employee record with a user in the org. The field is optional and unique.

WorkPhone.description: The employee's formatted work phone number including country code and extension.

WorkerType.description: Required. The type of worker for the employee.

WorkingHoursEnd.description: The end time of the employee’s working hours.

WorkingHoursStart.description: The start time of the employee’s working hours.
